thread.title: Software to Report Harassment Comes to VC Industry

author: Alexander Davis
title: Software to Report Harassment Comes to VC Industry
text:
As the venture industry comes to terms with sexual harassment, much of the conversation has centered on equipping female entrepreneurs to call out alleged bad actorsâ€”especially repeat offenders.
In response, a Y Combinator-backed developer of software that was created on college campuses unveiled plans Tuesday to expand to the startup ecosystem by providing founders with resources for reporting abuse or other misconduct.
Callisto,...
